name: Proof of Concept
description:
Jump, fight and teleport through this small action platformer

Basic action platformer gameplay combined with a unique mechanic involving the cursor for movement options.

Essentially a demo (i. e. a "Proof of concept", duh) that I made for practice aswell as for demonstrating the idea. I feel it could make a bigger, fleshed out game.

The game is played with mouse and keyboard and does NOT have gamepad support, but it DOES have left handed controls (being IJKL).

The level design is a bit of everything, because I wanted to show different ways the concept can be used, theoretically giving material for a variety of levels.

Everything from Visuals to Sounds made by me
